basics.name: Chien Nguyen
basics.label: AI Engineer
basics.summary: I am an AI Engineer at AIMENEXT JSC, Vietnam. I graduated in Applied Mathematics and informatics from Hanoi University of Science and Technology in 2020."

education.institution: Hanoi University of Science and Technology
education.area: Applied Mathematics and Informatics, Talented Program (Highest Honours)

highlights: Building and developing a digital conversion solution to extract administrative document information for provinces and cities using OCR technology and natural language processing (large language model)

work.company: CÔNG TY CỔ PHẦN GIAO HÀNG TIẾT KIỆM
work.summary: Lead a small team to solve and optimize production process problems. Combine with the infrastructure team to deploy the product.
highlights: Developing eKYC system including (OCR system for identity card, driving license extraction, ..., ReID system for face matching and searching, ...)
Develop and deploy solutions for problems related to packages such as tracking, reading order information on stamps, measuring package dimensions.
Training, deploy computer vision model to web application, edge devices such as mobile and jetson device.
Researched, designed, and implemented demo solution for the customers' problem.
Researched, designed, and implemented OCR systems can handle and extract information from various types of contexts and documents like Identity card, document image, license plate in the wild.
Optimize pre-processing system for OCR problem (specifically the problem of rectify document images).

Researched, designed, and implemented semantic segmentation, object detection, change detection model to solve customers's problem like analyze medical images, identify objects in electrical circuit design drawings, detect differences in printing, ...
Designed, implemented and management system for crawling, collecting bank card payment data using Selenium library.
Mentor AI Engineer Intern in solving computer vision problem and deploying solutions.
Developing data annotation tool for deep learning problem).
Researched and implemented solutions for speaker diarization, speaker identification problem for building applications that automatically generate meeting notes.
Build financial models, test, simulate and track the effectiveness of models (alpha) using internal operators and data.

work.position: Frontend Web Developer & Machine Learning Engineer Intern
highlights: Implemented a machine learning model for detecting road from satellite images.
